comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/42200
Committed: http://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/42749b7aff0863b807cf2041dbca2b415f7bb72e
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit 42749b7aff0863b807cf2041dbca2b415f7bb72e
Author: Andrew Laski <email address hidden>
Date:   Thu Aug 15 15:19:51 2013 -0400

    Enforce compute:update policy in API
    
    Now that compute/api.py:update() is no longer being called for instance
    updates the policy check is no longer enforced.  This adds policy
    checking back in at the API level so that the compute:update policy will
    continue to function as it did before.
    
    Bug 1212807
    
    Change-Id: I365ad8ac2845d914deefb841c314a50f4869dba0
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
